author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the olive oil in a small saucepan, add the onion, chorizo and curry powder and sauté for 3-4 minutes or until the onions have softened.  Add the chickpeas and simmer gently for six minutes. Serve in a bowl.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ¼ onion, finely chopped,  5 slices chorizo,  1 tsp mild curry powder,  50g/2oz tinned chickpeas, drained
